item.title: Thoughts on Teaching R and Yet Another Tidyverse Intro
item.description: Context Reflection Resources Up Front tibble %>% “Tidy” Data select() columns filter() Rows mutate() Columns arrange() Rows group_by() for Grouped Data summarize() Considering this is a blog post, I’m going to get all bloggy here before jumping into the code. Context I recently had the opportunity to teach some R coding to colleagues and classmates in a series of workshops. Some had already dabbled in R or other programming languages, but it was the first time that the majority of participants had written a single line of code.
